channel.title: Forcepk-- Be 99's Quick Pking, Easy items, Log on today for starter pack!
channel.description:
Yes you can PK in a party hat it has 33 armour. Client Download: https://mega.co.nz/#!WNtwlTDQ!qxrLnbu8PJqVHo64q2c8X0J7qFa6-NhDFdTj0RwPzr0 Alternate link: http://upx.nz/XErH4l
*once you have the client and can simply type in the name of character and password yo*u want
Website: http://forcepk.forumotion.com (there is another ad on our website)
Fast Exp, Easy drops. kill master questing. pk points pking skill portals for wilderness kill/death counter with sidestat (f2) pking skill FREE lobsters area for low level pking boxed off in wild. teleport to wild with ruby and diamond ammies. random item on killing somone. farm dragons, lessers, demons
::commands dragons, pkp, dm, castle, edge, plus more.
The best atmosphere for a rich pking scene. Once the cash is piled up then it will go on to staking in edgeville!
[img]http://i18.servimg.com/u/f18/19/27/46/11/screen10.png[/img] [img]http://i18.servimg.com/u/f18/19/27/46/11/pic112.png[/img] [img]http://i18.servimg.com/u/f18/19/27/46/11/screen11.png[/img] [img]http://i18.servimg.com/u/f18/19/27/46/11/pic211.png[/img]
see ya soon -Matt

item.description:
@inspectah wrote:

[quote=“matty matt, post:9, topic:552508”][quote author=Tim Dog link=topic=671425.msg4493594#msg4493594 date=1439908126]
matt, i played like 3 of your Servers and all of them have been fun, but they didnt last. will this?
[/quote]

Everyone is going crazy for slaypk and slayer right now. All the new stuff that keeps coming on that server…[/quote]

Those 6 people must be going insane!

item.title: Forcepk-- Be 99's Quick Pking, Easy items, Log on today for starter pack!
item.dc:creator: @matty_matt matty matt
item.description:
@matty_matt wrote:

Level 38 1 defense pure Last Man Standing event will happen… make your 38’s now and use ::fatigue for future events.

Winner will receive Full Rune with a Rune 2her.

Get a jump start now, server is only couple days old!!!

item.title: Forcepk-- Be 99's Quick Pking, Easy items, Log on today for starter pack!
item.dc:creator: @matty_matt matty matt
item.description:
@matty_matt wrote:

fran ta the brah:

rates? difficulty of getting items? Difficulty of gathering stackables?

fast rates,( i got 8 str levels from a chicken) easy to get items… stackables easy u can use ::buy or there is a shop in edgeville…might be hard to get first item but once u start killing monsters in wild or ranging them, it will be easy as eating a baked apple pie. Im sure you wont be disappointed and if you are voice your opinion we can make shit happen.

EDIT: ALSO, now is the time to start as i just released the server hours ago… get the jump on it. dont get pked bro!

Read full topic
